text.0: filled full of fatness compassing all things that be wide spacious dropping meath beautiful in their form.
text.1: the heaven and the earth by varuṇas decree unwasting rich in germs stand parted each from each.
text.2: the everlasting pair with full streams rich in milk in their pure rule pour fatness for the pious man.
text.3: ye who are regents of this world o earth and heaven pour into us the genial flow that prospers meit.
text.4: whoso for righteous life pours offerings to you o heaven and earth ye hemispheres that man succeeds.
text.5: he in his seed is born again and spreads by law from you flow things diverse in form but ruled alike.
text.6: enclosed in fatness heaven and earth are bright therewith they mingle with the fatness which they still increase.
text.7: wide broad set foremost at election of the priest to them the singers pray for bliss to further them.
text.8: may heaven and earth pour down the balmy rain for us balmdropping yielding balm with balm upon your path.
text.9: bestowing by your godhead sacrifice and wealth great fame and strength for us and good heroic might.
text.10: may heaven and earth make food swell plenteously for us allknowing father jother wondrous in their works.
text.11: pouring out bounties may in union both the worlds all beneficial send us gain and power and wealth.
